Topic.Title: How do you turn a text adventure into an app?

Posts.EditableText: How do you turn a text adventure into an app, and can I make this app cost money. I intend to create a full choose your own adventure game, with an original soundtrack, and with many writers. Can I make a text game made on Quest, into an app, and can I have it for .99 cents?
Posts.HTML: How do you turn a text adventure into an app, and can I make this app cost money. I intend to create a full choose your own adventure game, with an original soundtrack, and with many writers. Can I make a text game made on Quest, into an app, and can I have it for .99 cents?

Posts.EditableText: Have a look at this: viewtopic.php?f=10&t=4451&p=29325&hilit=app#p29325 And yes, you can sell your game
